title: Twitter repeatedly crashes as DeSantis tries to make presidential announcement
description: “We’ve got just a massive number of people online,” Elon Musk said. “So the servers are straining somewhat.”

title: Meet Windows Copilot, the AI coming to help you understand your PC
description: Microsoft is building AI into Windows 11 proper, making it the first major consumer PC platform to embrace large language models. Here's how it could help you.

title: U.S. says Chinese hackers breached gear in Guam, key to Pacific defense
description: The intruders could be laying the groundwork to disrupt communications between North America and Asia in the event of a military confrontation, according to researchers at Microsoft.

title: ChatGPT maker OpenAI calls for AI regulation, warning of ‘existential risk’
description: The leaders of OpenAI behind ChatGPT called for regulating artificial intelligence, suggesting an equivalent to the world’s nuclear watchdog.

title: Workers want a four-day week. Why hasn’t it happened?
description: The shortened workweek is gaining buzz, but it still faces hurdles before it’s widely adopted.
